players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Let's share our thoughts. Diana was killed, so mafia is among us. I'm town, who else can vouch?"
You: "I'm also town and shocked by Diana's death. We need to be careful not to trust blindly though."
Bob: "Alice is the mafia. I am the detective and I investigated her last night."
Charlie: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice first instead of someone more suspicious? That seems odd."
Bob: "Alice is the mafia. I investigated her first because she gave a calm, too-easy claim of being town, which raised my suspicion. We must vote to arrest her now before she kills again."
